7630.name: Path Through the Forest
description: The path widens slightly, as you near a building.  The snow gets deeper
here, and the temperature drops noticably.  Some smoke can be seen billowing
out of the treetops.

7511.name: Crescent Street
description: You walk along Crescent Street, which travels east and west from the
entrance.  There are darker sections on the city to both sides on you, and
to the north appears to be near the town center.  A giant tower looms
overhead, it reminds you of something...

7598.name: Barrel
description: The barrel stretches far over the lake and away from the Tree, about a
couple hundred yards.  The barrel itself is all you walk on, and it's all
you need being that it's a few yards in diameter.  From the size of this,
you better hope you aren't on it when it fires.  :P

7526.name: Frost Street
description: Frost Street continues, with shops along the sides.  The tall structures
in the distance slowly grow larger as you get closer to them.  You can hear
the hustle and bustle of people walking to and fro within the city.  The
street continues north and south.

7573.name: Inside The Tree
description: This connecting pathway is reaching its end, as other pathways pick up.
There aren't any ladders or stairs here.  Instead, the pathways are inclined
slightly so that each one acts as a ramp to a higher section of the tree.

7562.name: Dark Lake
description: Below you the waves splash against each other, in the stormy waters.  You
seem to be getting closer to the large structure, but you still can't place
it in your mind.  The area is getting darker, and the water is getting
rougher.

7617.name: BedRoom
description: The bedroom is fairly small, but at the same time feels very roomy.
There is a bed pushed against the wall, and a window overlooks the frozen
North.  A small fireplace quietly burns in the wall across from the bed.

7623.name: Bedroom
description: You stand in a large room, with wooden walls.  The ceiling has an
intricate painting, one like you're never seen.  The floor is made of wood,
and there is a very slight frost accumulating on it.  The door leads back
south where you came from.

7532.name: Supply Room of the SOE
description: Here is the supply room of the SOE.  This is where the members stock up
on essential items and products.  Shelves line the walls, covered with
bottles and boxes.  A store keeper sits behind the counter, which is on the
northern wall.  The only visible exit is back west.

7531.name: Main Hall of the SOE
description: You have entered a large, dark hall below the warehouse.  The shadows are
deep, with light filling the center of the room.  The very same light is
strange, with no apparent source.  Before you lies the Hall of the SOE.
Here is where the elite members meet, and go to other parts of the hall.
The floor is solid stone, as are the walls as well.  The ceiling is wood,
and there are rugs strewn about the room.  The air remains chilly here, but
along with the coldness lies protection, the protection of The Secret Order
of the Emperor.

7584.name: Path towards the Forest
description: The path narrows here, down to a two person width.  It leads into a dark
forest, which covers most of northeast Polaris.  Back west lies the City
Center, and east continues deeper into the woods.

7563.name: Dark Lake
description: The waters have become even darker now, and some of those birds are
flying a little closer than comfort.  Before you lies a massive tower, but
it's not like any tower you've seen before...

7576.name: Inside the Grand Sphere
description: You have entered the largest sphere in the Great Tree, and probably the
most important.  The walls are a dull grey, and the floors are wood
panelled.  There are portraits of the Tree on the walls, and some appear to
be schematic drawings.  A {2sign{x is hanging in the wall.  {@Read{x it
before you do anything else.
Anyone who wishes to meet the Emperor Teron, go west from here and check in.
If you are just visiting, please do not follow the north path without checking in to the west.
Thank you greatly.  --- The Imperial, Inc.

7568.name: Dark Pathway
description: You walk along a rickedy plankway, that reaches to other parts of the
tree.  The path is compoed of hundreds of wooden planks, just like a rope
bridge.  The pathway continues, and appears to widen up ahead.

7508.name: Guild of Wizzards
description: You have entered a large room, with stone walls, and some wood.  The
floor is wood, with carpets thrown about.  There are wizards standing about,
reading in books or just sitting around.  Bookshelves line the walls,
apparently filled with spellbooks and scrolls.  It is slightly warmer in
here than the outside.

7521.name: Alley
description: The alley continues, with tall buildings on the sides.  The air is cold,
and small snowflakes fall every so often.  The road is covered in a slight
frost, as is most of the city.

7648.name: Kitchen
description: You have entered a large kitchen, with pots hanging down from the ceiling
and cupboards on the walls.  There is a peppery smell to the warm air, and a
mist of powder can be seen.  Back east lies the Hallway.

7631.name: Deep Forest
description: You walk in a dark forest, with thick trees and a snow-covered mossy
ground.  Small noises can be heard from within the underbrush.  There is a
slight snow dropping from above, and the treetops hold the rest out.

7597.name: Airpad
description: You stand on a large airpad, which is where any airship may land.  It is
all part of the large pad on top of the tree, which in itself is very odd.
The wind blows softly, and the cold sinks down into your bones.

7537.name: Emperor Way
description: You are walking along Emperor Way, the main street of Polaris.  It leads
to the more populized areas of the city.  Emperor Way continues east and
west.

7559.name: Icy Shore
description: You stand on a large shore, half covered with frost.  The shore yields to
a spectacular view of a large dark lake.  The scenery is beautiful, but as
you notice above the dark waters fly monstrous birds, and what's that
they're flying around?

7640.name: Entranceway
description: You stand in a large entrance hall, which leads into a tall mansion.
There are rugs thrown over the floor, and paintings on the walls.  It's warm
in here, in contrast to the cold of the city of Polaris.

7578.name: Emperor's Throne Room
description: Before you lies a large room, almost completely different from the rest
of the rooms you've seen.  The floor here is metallic, and there are a few
windows.  There are four stone pillars, each one equidistant from the
others.  In front of you lies a metal-looking chair, facing away from you.
The chair faces a massive round window, which for some strange reason looks
outside.
The window looks outside, although this is the center of the Tree.  It
not only looks at the lake surrounding the tree, but it seems to picture the
entire realms of Waterdeep.

7583.name: Residence
description: This home is vacant, or at least it seems to be at the moment.  There is
no one around, and there doesn't seem to be anyone anywhere in this Tree.
Nonetheless, this home appears to have been used before, and fairly recent.
Wonder where everyone went...

7624.name: Hallway
description: You stand in a small hallway, which is somewhere under the dark lake.  It
links the northwest part of Polaris to the middle of the lake.  What lies at
the end of the hall is unknown.  North takes you to the entrance to the hall
and south brings you deeper.

7632.name: Stone Path
description: You walk along a large stone path, which leads the the northern part of
Polaris.  There is a slight frost on the ground.  The snow falls lightly,
and the temperature feels a bit chilly.  South lies the rest of Polaris.

7650.name: Hallway
description: You walk down a small hallway, leading to the open air.  Light can be
seen ahead, in contrast to the darkness in here.

7655.name: Alley
description: The alley ends here.  The air is freezing cold and only the
occasional flicker of a snowflake can be seen in the darkness.  There
appears to be doors on either side of this dead end.

7633.name: Graveyard
description: The path turns into a small graveyard, which surprisingly has no snow or
frost on it.  It's still cold here, but there are no signs of precipitation.
Some graves are stuck in the ground, and a clearing can be seen to the
north.

7620.name: BedRoom
description: You stand in a fairly small bedroom, with a bed and a window looking out
into Polaris.  A small fireplace quietly burns across from the bed.  A large
rug also covers the entire floor.

7502.name: Tunnel in the Mountains
description: The tunnel makes a sharp turn, and seems to still go on.  Still no light
can be seen from another end.  The air is getting colder, but yet it isn't
uncomfortable.  The wind blows calmly, finding small cracks to whistle
through.

7638.name: Pathway
description: You walk along a small path in the graveyard, which leads to a small
cave.  There is still no snow on thr ground, and the temperature remains
steady.  Back south lies the graveyard.

7564.name: Rocky Shore
description: You have finally crossed the dark lake, only to be met with a bleak and
dreary shore, covered with rocks.  You see nothing important here...  Until
you glance upwards.  A massive tower looms overhead, creating a huge shadow
over your cowering form.  The tower itself looks like a gigantic tree, a
trunk coming out of the ground, but then turns into a huge spherical top.
The sphere is dark grey, and multiple windows can be seen all over it.

7541.name: Crystal Street
description: Crystal Street continues north and south, and an alleyway branches off
east.  You have started to enter the slums section of the city, so you'd
better watch yourself and your wallet.  The air's chill sinks deep into your
bones, but it's strangely comforting.

7643.name: Bedroom
description: You stand in a large bedroom, with a very large doorway.  A bed is
against the western wall, and a large rug covers the floor.  Back east lies
the hallway in the Residence.

7627.name: Path through the Forest
description: You walk along a large path, which leads into a forest.  The City Center
is south of here, and north lies the rest of the Forest.  The trees and
ground are covered with a slight snow, and there are a few snowflakes
falling.

7626.name: Hallway
description: The hallway comes to an end to the east, with a small door at the end.
The pounding sound of machinery can be heard, and the sound of steam is also
detectable.  West leads back to the rest of the underground hallway.

7606.name: Reactor No. 2
description: A large reactor towers over you, reaching up far above.  There is a large
pipe running out of the reactor, which carries the reactor's product.  The
soft hum of the reactor if very comforting.  It is slightly warmer in here
than the other rooms.

7547.name: Alleyway
description: You are standing on the northern branch of the alleyway.  The slums are
all around you.  Dark Buildings lie west and some more appear to be to the
east.  Back south lies the alleyway.

7518.name: Sharpened Point
description: You stand in a small room, filled with cases and shelves, lines with all
types of items.  The majority of them appear to be weapons, however.  The
shopkeeper sits behind a counter, watching you.  There is a sign on the
wall, catching your eyes.
<========== The Sharpened Point ==========>
For a listing of items for sale, you know the drill.  List.

7540.name: Crystal Street
description: You walk along Crystal Street, which runs north and south of the great
City Center.  Buildings line the sides of the street.  South leads towards
the City Slums, and north leads back to the City Center.

7509.name: Ice Street
description: You stand on Ice Street, which appears to lead to a larger road.  Shops
and stores can be seen farther into the city.  People walk around, talking
to one another.  The air is cold, yet very comfortable.

7589.name: Basement
description: You stand below the small building.  Small gleams of light shine through
the cracks in the floor, which is just enough to create shadows down here.
The walls and floor are stone, and the temperature has dropped down again.

7515.name: Crescent Street
description: You walk along Crescent Street, one of the major roads in Polaris.  You
can see tall buildings in the distance, but much smaller ones closer to you.
The air has a chill to it, with an occasional snowflake.  The street
continues east and west.

7595.name: Top of the Elevator
description: You have reached the top of the Tree.  Beyond here lies what remains with
you.  Nothing up here will be discussed, for reasons you must be trusted to
even be here.  Enjoy the view.

7519.name: Secret Basement
description: You have found a small room, containing all the stock items for The
Sharpened Point.  There are weapons, chests, and all types of items
cluttered around.  A small box catches you eye.  You better leave before you
get caught down here.

7554.name: Warehouse
description: You have entered a large building, with boxes and crates strewn about the
room.  The floor is covered with sawdust.  The air chills your bones for a
moment, but it passes.  There are no apparent exits other than where you
came from.

7504.name: Opening in the Tunnel
description: The tunnel widens until it is no more.  Before you lies a vast city,
bustling with people walking around, going in buildings, and talking amongst
themselves.  The air is cold, and it sinks down to your bones, yet it isn't
uncomfortable.  Wherever this place is, it seems to be a perfect place.

7579.name: Library of Waterdeep
description: You have entered the ancient library of Waterdeep.  It not only holds the
entire knowledge of the realms, but it grants it to whom have patience.
There are bookshelves lining every wall, each one filled with dozens of
books.  There are chairs in the middle of the room, arranged in a circular
pattern.  Being here makes you feel like not ever leaving again.  For he who
holds the knowledge of the realms, holds the greatest power.

7565.name: Stone Door
description: Before you lies a large stone door.  A smaller door is set within the
larger one.  It it dark stone, blending in with the dark grey of the sphere.
No one seems to be around here, but there's probably someone out here
somewhere.  Those birds are still flying about the tree, searching,
searching.

7590.name: Crystal Hallway
description: You walk along a hallway, with walls made completely of ice crystal.  The
floors are stone, and the ceiling matches the walls.  This hallway seems to
continue on it's path, but the end isn't in sight.  Wherever you are, it
doesn't look like many people have been here.

7594.name: Wooden Elevator
description: You stand in a small wooden elevator room, with large lever on the left
side.  The air is still very cold, but a glint of warmth lingers about.

7507.name: Entrance to the Guild of Wizzards
description: You stand in a large entrance room, filled with wall coverings and rugs.
The walls themselves appear to be made of wood and stone.  It is slightly
warmer in here than outside, but the colder air had a certain comfort to it.

7517.name: Crescent Street
description: You have reached the end of Crescent Street.  Buildings are on the sides
of it, and it looks like a small alley extends from it.  You can hear the
buzz of people talking and walking around the city.  This surely is a busy
place.

7561.name: Dark Lake
description: Below you the lake remains unfrozen, although the air's temperature is
enough to make tears freeze.  Ahead hellish birds fly about, and they appear
to be flying around some sort of gigantic tower-like structure...

7523.name: Guild of Mercenaries
description: You stand in a large room, along with some other people.  This is the
Guild of Mercenaries, where to are trained to be a ruthless cutthroat.  The
guildmaster stands here, teaching his apprentices how to block, parry and
dodge.  He appears to be old and weak, but something tells you he isn't.

7544.name: Alleyway
description: The alley branches off from Crystal Street, one of the major roads in
Polaris.  It leads towards the City Slums, the most run-down section of
Polaris.  The slums look bad from here, can't wait until you get deep into
them.  :P

7575.name: Inside the Tree
description: The pathway comes to an end here, and before you lies the biggest sphere
in this tree.  It is big, dark, and not very family-friendly looking.  You
can sense a dark and powerful aura around it, and probably even worse is
inside.

7533.name: Donation Room of the SOE
description: You stand in a small room, with chests and pits in it.  It is the
donation room for the members of the SOE.  Leave any unwanted items and
wares that someone else could use.  The only visible exit is back north.

7543.name: Temple of the Third Priest
description: Before you lies a large room, with a powerful aura to it.  The walls are
made of wood, and the floor is also wood.  There are tapestries covering
almost all of the wallspace, and there is a beautiful painting on the
ceiling.

7514.name: Crescent Street
description: The street continues east and west.  There is a shop to the north.  A
sign reads 'The Sharpened Point'.  The air is chilly, but yet not
uncomfortable.  You hear sounds of people talking and creatures scurrying
around.  The city spans your view for a long way.

7618.name: BedRoom
description: You stand in a moderately small bedroom.  There is a small bed against
the wall, and a window that overlooks the city of Polaris.  A fireplace
softly kindles across from the bed.

7560.name: Dark Lake
description: The lake spans your entire field of view.  The air is freezing cold, yet
the water below remains unfrozen.  You get a feeling there's something
strange going on around here...

7556.name: Crystal Street
description: You walk along Crystal Street, one of the main roads in Polaris.  It
seems to stretch towards the more populized areas of the city.  Off in the
distance lies a large tower.

7503.name: Tunnel in the Mountain
description: The tunnel still goes on, getting colder as you go.  The wind is picking
up a bit, but not much.  As you stare into the darkness, a faint glimmer of
light catches your eye.  Is this the end of the tunnel, or someone else?

7529.name: Emperor Way
description: You walk on Emperor Way, the main road in Polaris.  It reaches towards
the center of the city, along with all the large structures you've seen.
People walk about, going into and out of small buildings along the street.

7591.name: Crystal Hallway
description: The hallway continues, and it seems to widen as you go.  The walls and
ceiling are made of intricate ice crystal, and the floor is stone.  Wherever
this leads, it appears to be pretty important.

7637.name: Small Shack
description: You stand in a small shack, which houses the graveyard keeper.  There are
pictures covering the walls, mostly ones of horror.  Books are thrown about,
and most look pretty spooky.  It is warmer in here than the rest of the
Graveyard.

7548.name: Alleyway
description: The alley gets smaller here, leading to the rest of the slums.  There is
a slight frost built up on the ground, along with the frost on the
buildings.  Back north leads to the rest of the city, and south takes you to
the infamous City Slums.

7611.name: Bedroom
description: You stand in a large building, with wooden walls and a high wooden
ceiling.  There are lights spread around the room, and some paintings are on
the walls.  The exit is back east where you came from.

7592.name: Frost Corridor
description: You have reached the apparent end of this journey.  What lies ahead is
probably greater than anything you're ever laid eyes on.  The temperature
must be at least 50 below, and there is frost building up on the floor and
walls.

7557.name: Frost Street
description: You walk along Frost Street, which reaches north of Polaris.  To the east
lies the famous City Center, and south takes you near the city entrance.  Up
ahead lies some more residential areas.

7600.name: Hallway
description: You have entered a large hallway, which leads under the Tree.  Right
about now you must be under the Lake somewhere.  The walls appear to be made
of some kind of metal, and lights brighten the path up ahead.

7520.name: Alley
description: A small alleyway branches from Crescent Street.  The alley doesn't seem
to lead anywhere, but probably it does.  Walls of buildings line the alley,
with an occational door.  The air is still very cold.

7615.name: Hallway
description: The hallway comes to an end here, with doors on either side.  There is a
window at the end of the hall, looking out into the streets of Polaris.  A
slight frost is built up along the window frame, which in turn slightly
cools down the room.

7528.name: Frost Street
description: The street continues, reaching farther north.  It appears to lead towards
the warrior's guilds and some more shops.  Some residences can also be seen
along the way.  The road goes north and south.

7581.name: Dark Path
description: The path leads to some smaller spheres, each one resembling the next.
This particular pathway seems to be nearing it's end.  Glancing up, the top
of the Great Tree looms above, not allowing any natural light in.

7550.name: Alleyway
description: This is the end of the alleyway.  It leads to a few small buildings, and
some noise can be heard to the south.  You can travel back west to the rest
of the slums.

7506.name: Ice Street
description: The steet continues, and it looks like there's an intersection ahead.
You see buildings ans shops on neighboring streets, with the assortment of
people with them.  The temperature is still cold, and the wind is blowing
softly.  This street goes north and south.

7644.name: Guest Room
description: This is the guest bedroom, where guests of the residence's owner stay.
There is a small bed in the corner, and some modest paintings on the walls.
Back west lies the hallway.

7599.name: Stairwell
description: You stand on a large stairwell, about two people wide.  The steps are
wooden, and a small banister rides on the wall next to you.  Down the stairs
is darker, and a soft mechanical noise can be heard.

7571.name: Inside The Tree
description: The pathway continues, as it reaches towards one of the spheres.  The air
is cold, but the chill is strangely comfortable.  Upwards strectches more of
this vast tree, and the sides go as far as the eye can see.

7513.name: Crescent Street
description: Crescent Street ends here, and Crystal Street picks up to the north.  The
City Center lies a ways in the direction.  The slums are just to the east of
here, so better watch yourself.  A building lies to the south...  It has a
strange glow to it.

7587.name: Small Pathway
description: The pathway seems to come to an end here, and a building lies nearby.
The snow is getting very deep here, and the temperature must be at least 20
below.  There is very little light here, due to the dense treetop layer in
the forest.

7601.name: Hallway
description: The hallway leads deeper and deeper, and the end can be seen ahead.  It
appears to open up into a much larger area.  The mechanical noise has gotten
much louder here, and the temperature feels like it's dropping.

7636.name: Graveyard
description: You walk along the graveyard path, which leads to an old shack.  There is
no snow around here, unlike the rest of Polaris.  Some smoke billows out of
the shack ahead.

7546.name: Alleyway
description: You stand on a bend in the alleyway.  Back west lies the rest of Polaris,
and south goes to the City Slums.  Darkness fills almost all of the alley,
with a few exceptions.  The air seems to be getting chillier.

7582.name: Residence
description: You have entered a small residence, probably belonging to the inhabitants
of the Tree.  But, however, you haven't really seen any people that live
here.  The walls of this place are a dark shade of tan, and the floor is
composed of intricate wood boards.

7522.name: Guild of Mercenaries
description: You stand in a small room, covered with weapons and armor on the walls.
The floor is made of stone, and the walls are wood.  The room is slightlt
warmer than the rest of the city, but there's still a sense of comfort in
the air.  There is no apparent exit other than the way back out...

7549.name: Alleyway
description: The alley spits again, and forms a T going east and west.  You have
officially entered the most run-down part of the slums.  Although this is
the worst place of the city, it still seems to have a strange comfort to it.

7619.name: BedRoom
description: You have entered a small bedroom, with a bed pushed against the wall and
a small window looking out into the streets of Polaris.  A small fireplace
is set in the wall across from the bed.

7642.name: Hallway
description: The hallway leads to a couple doors, which occupy the upper section of
the Residence.  It's warm in here, but not quite as comfortable as the
colder air of Polaris.  Back down is the main part of the building.

7524.name: Frost Street
description: Here begins Frost Street.  It reaches north from Crescent Street.  This
road was named well, due to the amount of frost built up on it.  Large
buildings can be seen in the distance, along with smaller ones up close.
The air is still very chilly.

7641.name: Residence
description: You have entered a large building, with intricate ceilings and walls.
There is a large staircase leading to the upper floor.  Back west lies the
entrance, and some other doors are on the other walls.

7616.name: Hallway
description: The hallway continues, and comes to and end here.  Doors are on both
sides of the hall, and at the end lies a small window.  A smokey scent is
slightly detectable here.

7593.name: Polaris
description: As you walk into the room, it {8dar{7k{8ens{x slightly.  There appears to
be no walls, no ceiling, and no floor.  Even with no floor, you can still
walk around.  Upwards, instead of an {6i{^c{8e{x ceiling, is nothingness.
All around you are the {#s{3tar{#s{x.  Out in front of you is a small
sphere, resembling a planet.  As you look around there and many of these,
but all out of reach.  The air is very {^c{6ol{^d{x, but it is extremely
comfortable.  Here is the truth of Polaris; the meaning; the existence.  All
around you lie the answers.

7645.name: Hallway
description: The hallway leads to the northern part of the Residence.  It's very warm
here, in contrast with the rest of Polaris.  South lies the main hall of the
Residence.

7500.name: Tunnel in the Mountain
description: The path ends into a large tunnel.  The lighting is very poor, if any in
some spots.  The ground is dry and the air is a bit nippy.  Noises reach out
of the shadows...  Who knows what could be making them.  The tunnel appears
to go on, although no light can be seen at the other end.

7603.name: Entraceway
description: You stand in a large entranceway, which leads to who knows what.  There
is a small path that leads past the way, and it seems to lead towards some
buoldings.  The ground is covered with a slight frost, and there is a little
snow falling at the moment.

7542.name: Crystal Street
description: The street contiunes, and looks like it's nearing it's end in the south.
East lies the City Slums, and north is the famous City Center.  Frost covers
the road and buildings, and snowflakes fall silently.

7510.name: Crescent Street
description: This is the end of Ice Street, and where Crescent Street picks up.  You
may go east or west, as so the street appears to lead.  People come in and
out of buildings, which cover the city.  The street is made of stone, and
has a slight frost on it.  You catch a snowflake out of the corner of your
eye.

7607.name: Control Room
description: You have entered a large control room, with levels and buttons and panels
all over.  There appears to be a main console in the middle of the room,
seeing how there is the most levels and such there.  The soft hum of
reactors can be heard all around.  A large {2sign{x is mounted on the wall.
Authorized Personel only.  {8The I{7mp{&er{7ia{8l, {7Inc. is not responsible for any injuries sustained by any other persons.
Please be careful, and remain without contact of the Reactors.

7647.name: Hallway
description: The hallway ends here, and there's a couple doors at the end.  The
ceiling is fairly high here, and the walls stretch up like a pair of towers.
It's quite warm here, unlike the outside air of Polaris.

7574.name: Inside the Tree
description: The pathway winds upwards, reaching towards one of the biggest spheres
inside this tree.  It feels very gloomy here, possibly due to the dull grey
and black colors.  As you get higher into this tree, the top can be seen.
It just looks like you're in a big grey sphere.  The walls are bumpy and
dozens of smaller spheres are spread around.

7622.name: Inn of Shadows
description: You stand in a large entranceway, with a high ceiling and wooden walls.
There is a large rug covering most of the floor, and a desk sits against the
wall.  A large grand staircase leads the way to the second floor.  South of
here is the Inn Bar, where you can sit back from a day's adventuring.

7634.name: Graveyard
description: There are a few graves set in the ground, and a worn path leads around
them.  The wind blows softly, and still no snow falls.  Back east lies the
main path of the graveyard.

7649.name: Dining Hall
description: The dining hall is a grand room, with a ceiling that reaches up as high
as the eye can see.  A large table fills the center of the room.  Small
candles cover the walls, providing enough light to fill this large room.

7545.name: Alleyway
description: You walk along the alleyway, which stretches towards the City Slums.  The
alley branches off to the north, and continues to the east and west.

7501.name: Tunnel in the Mountain
description: The tunnel continues, with no apparent end.  The lighting is still low,
and a cool breeze blows through your hair.  The tunnel itself looks odd,
almost man made.  The walls are smooth and cold, with only a few
outcroppings.  Wherever this goes, it doesn't seem to go to any primitive
place.

7605.name: Reactor No. 1
description: Before you lies a massive reactor, which stretches up high above you.
Some sort of smoke pours from the top, and it hums softly.  A large pipeline
runs back the way you came, along with the path.  There is a small {2sign{x
posted on the wall.
{$Attention!!{x
Only authorized persons allowed.  {8The I{7mp{&er{7ia{8l, {7Inc. is not responsible for any injuries.{x

7555.name: Residence of the Fifth Disciple
description: You have entered a large room, filled with normal home items.  The walls
are wood, and the floor is also wood.  There are paintings on the wall, most
depict a dark land, with hellish birds flying about.  You feel a strange
presence in this room, one that isn't hospitable.

7538.name: Emperor Way
description: Emperor Way continues east and west.  Buildings lie north and south.
Towards the eastern part of the city lies the city center.  Also near the
center is a massive tower-like structure...  It is oddly familiar...

7646.name: Library
description: You stand in the Residence's Library, a huge room filled with shelves of
books.  A large desk is toward the back of the room.  Back west lies the
Hallway.

7512.name: Crescent Street
description: Crescent Street continues, travelling east and west.  A break in the road
appears in the east, where the City Slums lie.  To the West appears the
residential section.  The City Center lies north, and near that a strange
structure can be seen...  It reminds you of something very familiar.

7608.name: Hallway
description: You stand in a very small hallway, which leads as far as the eye can see.
There is very little light, but the path seems to be straight.  The air is
very cold, and a frost covers the floor.

7625.name: Hallway
description: You walk in a hallway, that's underneath the dark lake.  This hall leads
towards the apparent middle of the lake, and whatever lurks there.  East
leads towards the end, and north takes you to the rest of the hallway.

7567.name: Spiral Staircase
description: A large spiral staircase leads upwards, leading to more of the tree.  The
room has no decorations, just like the last.  The stairs themselves seem to
be made of some strange wood, nothing like you've ever seen.

7570.name: Inside The Tree
description: Small spheres surround you, resembling some type of cluster-nut.  The
pathway that you stand on is almost like some type of rope-ladder bridge.
It is very dark here, but multiple lanterns on the spheres light the area
around them.

7572.name: Inside The Tree
description: The pathway branches off in this direction from it main part.  Around you
lie dozens of smaller spheres, with lights around them.  The path seems to
lead to another main pathway.  This system of paths is incredibly advanced.

7614.name: Hallway
description: The Hallway strectes down the middle of the Upper Inn, where the rooms
are located.  There is a long rug that covers the hall, and doors are on the
sides.  Small lights are placed along the walls in between each of the
doors.  It is slightly warmer in here than the rest of the Inn.

7639.name: Small Cave
description: The cave has a tall stone ceiling, and rock walls.  There is a slight
glow coming from no apparent source.  A faint dripping water noise can be
heard.

7609.name: Entrance Hall
description: You stand in a large entrance hall, filled with paintings and lights.
There is a large rug covering most of the floor.  The building itself seems
to go father back, and appears to be rather large.

7628.name: Path Through the Forest
description: The path continues, and the snow gets a bit deeper.  It is also getting a
little colder as you go.  The clearing is back east, and the path leads
deeper into the trees.  Some noise can be heard from up ahead.

7551.name: Alleyway
description: You stand on the end of the alleyway.  Around you lie dark buildings, and
lots of crates are piled along the street.  The shadows grow before your
very eyes, and who knows what may lurk in them.  The slight smell of burning
wood is in the cool air.

7586.name: Small Pathway
description: The larger path branches off, and leads to the north.  Through the dense
forest you can almost make out a small building.  The snow gets a bit deeper
on the ground here, and the temperature is still dropping.

7530.name: Warehouse
description: Looks like the plain, ordinary warehouse you see in all them
picture-books.  Crates are stacked in an unshevled manner all over the
warehouse floor.  The ceiling has some small holes in it, where tiny
snowflakes reach through.  There doesn't seem to be anyone here, but you'd
better watch it just the same.

7604.name: Hallway
description: The pathway leads to some buildings, and the path itself is more like a
hallway, due to the enclosed ceiling.  Some mechanical noise can be heard
from the direction of the buildings.

7651.name: Hallway
description: You walk along the hallway, and it reaches the end here.  Light fills the
room from the exit out into the open.

7536.name: Emperor Way
description: Emperor Way continues, travelling east and west from here.  To the east
lies taller buildings that what you've seen so far.  Off in the distance a
giant tower can be seen, it looks oddly familiar...

7613.name: Inn of Shadows
description: You have entered the Inn of Shadows, a large Inn/Tavern in Polaris.  The
lighting is dim, and the lights that do exist create shadows around
everything else.  That's probably where it got the name.  There are tables
spread around the room, and a bar sits off to the side.  There is a small
stage in the corner where the entertainment performs.

7516.name: Crescent Street
description: The street continues, and looks like it is coming to an end up ahead.
People walk about, chatting amongst themselves.  Buildings cover the city,
and much taller ones appear to be in the middle.  The road has a slight
frost on it.

7505.name: Ice Street
description: The tunnel leaves off and Ice street begins.  The road isn't all that
icy, but maybe it's just the temperature today.  People walk about, not
really caring that you're here.  The city looks pretty impressive from where
you are.  This road continues north.

7629.name: Path Through the Forest
description: The Path comes to an end here, and leads into a large clearing.  The snow
gets shallow here, and the temperature is a bit warmer.  Some noise is heard
coming from the clearing.

7558.name: Stone Path
description: The road has changed from a heavy-packed surface to a stone pathway.  It
seems to lead towards a lake, but you don't recall ever hearing or seeing a
lake around here...

7553.name: Tavern of the Crescent Star
description: The room is halfway lit up, but you can still see most of the room.
There is a bar in the middle of the place, and seats are along the walls.
There is a dome-like ceiling above, reaching a few yards higher than the
walls.  The air is chilly here, and you can feel it sink down into your
bones.  There is still a strange feeling of comfort, even with the
temperature being so cold.  Here you feel like this is your true home.
Welcome to the Crescent Star, where times last forever, along with the
drinks.

7602.name: Reactor
description: Before you lies a massive system of pipes and boilers and whatnot.  In
the center of the room lies what appears to be a gigantic reactor,
stretching up into the high ceiling.  The hum of machinery pulses around
you, and you can almost feel the power.  A large output pipe runs up and out
of the room, and whatever that goes to must be BIG.  A small {2sign{x is
posted on the wall next to you.
{$Attention!!{x
Personel only beyond this point.  The Imperial, Inc. is not responsible for any injury upon unauthorized persons.
Thank you, and please be careful.
[{8The Im{7p{&er{7i{8al, {7Inc.]{x

7569.name: Inside the Tree
description: Your jaw drops to the floor, as you gaze upon the inside of the great
tree.  It spans your entire view, and probably more higher.  Inside the tree
is composed of dozens of smaller spheres like the outside of the tree.  They
probably serve as apartments or homes.  But, you still haven't seen any
inhabitants of the tree.  The pathway leads in all directions.

7539.name: City Center
description: You have entered the center of Polaris.  The splendors of the city
surround you, the towers, the small buildings, everything is in perfect
harmony with everything else.  People bustle about their business, taking
very little time to stop and rest.  There is a slight frost built up on the
ground, and snowflakes fall silently about the street.  A large {$sign{0 is
posted in the middle of the street.  There are roads reaching north, south,
east and west here.
North/South:  Northern City/City Slums
East/West:  Western City/City Slums
This area was originally created in June of 1998.
Official creator of Polaris is Teron, of [ {8The I{7mp{&er{7ia{8l{x, Inc. ]{x

7525.name: Frost Street
description: You walk along Frost Steet, which runs north and south from Crescent
Steet.  A shop lies west of here.  The frost still coves this road, and an
occational snowflake drops before you.

7596.name: On Top of the Tree
description: Before you lies a vast canyon, in which the Tree rests within.  All
around is a lake of darkness, which further secludes the Tree.  This top is
very strange, for it is not tree-like.  It's almost like a metal platform
built on top.  And on this platform lies the destroyer of destruction, the
biggest of bigs, the mother of mothers.  {8It's one {$bi{4g {8as{4s{$ed
{8cannon.  {0

7534.name: Hallway in the SOE
description: You walk along a hallway in the SOE hall.  The walls are stone and the
floor is stone as well.  The air's chill sinks down into your bones.  East
lies the Entrance Hall, south lies the Healing Room, and North lies the rest
of the hallway.

7588.name: Small Building
description: You stand in a small building, with wooden walls and floors.  There is a
fire blazing in the fireplace, which greatly raises the temperature.  There
are a few windows, which look outside into the wintery forest.

7612.name: Inn of Shadows
description: Here is the Inn Bar, where all the travellers come and meet.  A large bar
fills the center of the room, and a table is off in the corner.  A small
stage is in the corner, where the entertainment is held.  The bar gets
darker and deeper to the west.

7621.name: Corner of the Inn
description: This is the back corner of the Inn, where most of the low life scums hang
out.  There is a table in the corner, and that's about it.  There are a few
wall hangings, looks like one guy couldn't get out of the way before the
others got impatient with the darts.  His smiling face is now here forever.

7566.name: Wooden Room
description: You stand in a large room, with wooden walls, floors and ceilings.  There
are no decorations to be seen here, except for the door back north.  A few
exits can be seen, leading to who knows where.  A strong aura fills this
place.

7552.name: Small Building
description: You have entered a small structure, with crates and boxes stacked up.
There is no one around, but noise can be heard from above.  The floor has
sawdust all over it, and there don't appear to be many footprints in it.

7635.name: Graveyard
description: The path of the graveyard comes to an end here, and some old looking
stones are set in the ground.  There seems to be a dark presence here.

7527.name: Intersection of Frost and Emperor
description: Here lies the intersection of Frost Street and Emperor Way.  Frost
continues north and south, and Emperor extends east.  Emperor Way leads to
the City Square, the center of Polaris.  The tall buildings are very close,
and probably accessible from Emperor Way.

7585.name: Path through the Forest
description: The forest gets a bit more dense here, and the ground is covered with a
fine snow powder.  The temperature feels very cool here, but it's still very
comfortable.  The path continues to lead deeper and deeper into the forest.

7610.name: Residence of the Fourth Disciple
description: The walls stand tall around you, and the ceiling has an intricate
painting of some holy guy.  The cold air still reaches into this place, but
the cold has a strange comfort to it.  The entrance lies back south.

7577.name: Dark Hallway
description: You walk down a dark hallway, which leads to more of the sphere.  The
floor is almost a sandy-wood texture.  There are no windows here, along with
no doors.  Except one.

7580.name: Inside the Grand Sphere
description: The room has wood panelled walls and a low ceiling.  There is a desk on
the northern wall, and a woman sits behind that very desk.  There are
paintings on the room of the Tree, and others of Teron.  This appears to be
like a receptionist's room.

7500.name: The Shopkeeper~
description: The shopkeeper stands before you.  Her long auburn hair hangs down her back.  She smiles at you, looking with her deep green eyes. She doesn't appear to be all that strong, but you had better not try anything just the same.
subroutines:
F for AHM
F par DEGHIJK
M grall 7534 100~
7500.room_name: The shopkeeper stands behind a counter, watching you.

7501.name: the bartender~
description:
He looks back at you and smiles.  He is in his fifties, with brown hair and a beard.
He doesn't look very strong, but I bet he's settled a few bar fights back in his day.
subroutines:
F for AHM
F par DEFGHIJK
M act 7516 holds~
M random 7542 80~
7501.room_name: The bartender slides drinks across the bar and smiles.

7502.name: The Welcomer~
description: He is about 5'8", grey hair and probably in his 60's.  He welcomes you with a bright smile.
subroutines:
F for MV
F par DEFGHIJK
M grall 7510 100~
7502.room_name: An old man stands here, talking to whomever he sees.

7503.name: The Stone Guard~
description: He is big and mean.  Better not mess with him.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M grall 7502 100~
7503.room_name: A large stone guard stands here, watching the shores.

7504.name: The Warehouse Thug~
description: He is big, mean, and not too handsome.  Better keep your distance.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par DEFGHIJK
M give 7503 7513~
M exall 7515 5~

7505.name: The Secretary~
description: She is about 5'7", light brown hair and green eyes.  She is perfectly built, but you better not mess with her.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M speech 7504 yes~
M speech 7505 no~
M grall 7506 100~
7505.room_name: The Emperor's Secretary is sitting at a desk.

7506.name: Imperia Guard~
description: She is about 5'10", dark blone hair and deep green eyes.  She looks well built, so you had better not mess with her.
subroutines:
F for AMV
F par DEFGHIJK
M grall 7511 100~
M exall 7507 0~
M delay 7508 100~
M speech 7509 slots~
7506.room_name: Imperia Guard stands here, looking you over.

7507.name: The Guildmaster~
description: He is in his late 70's, and has a long grey beard.  He looks like he has more knowledge than anyone here.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M grall 7512 100~
7507.room_name: An old man walks about, teaching followers.

7508.name: The Black Vulture~
description: It is extremely large and a very dark shade of grey.  It doesn't look like the conversational type.
7508.room_name: A hellish black vulture circles above.

7509.name: A Street Urchin~
description: He is medium sized and not very friendly looking.  Better not mess with him.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M grall 7513 100~
7509.room_name: A Street Urchin walks in and out of the shadows.

7510.name: The Snow Elder~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M fight 7514 65~
7510.room_name: An old man stands here staring upwards.

7511.name: The Operator~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M grall 7518 100~
M exall 7519 4~
M speech 7517 up~
7511.room_name: A suited Operator stands here, waiting for action.

7512.name: The Fortress Guard~
description: He stands tall before you, towering over your cowering form.  Better watch out for him.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M speech 7522 down~
M exall 7521 2~
M exall 7520 0~
7512.room_name: A large Guard stands here, guarding the elevator.

7513.name: The Laudinum Guard~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M exall 7525 1~
M give 7524 7527~
M grall 7523 100~
7513.room_name: A large {8g{7u{&a{7r{8d{x towers over you form.

7514.name: The {8Se{7cu{&ity Sol{7di{8er{x~
description: He stands tall above you, with no expression on his face.  Looks like he's pretty hardened.  Better watch out.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M give 7526 7531~
M give 7526 7531~
M exall 7527 3~

7515.name: The Ice Guard~
description: He stands tall above you, and he gives off a slight coldness to the air.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M fight 7529 80~

7516.name: The Mercenary~
description: He is fairly tal, and in his late 50's.  He looks pretty tough, so better not try anything.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

7517.name: The Attendant~
description: He is about 5'6", and in his thirties.  He has dark brown hair, and is covered in traveller's clothing.  He doesn't look very happy.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
7517.room_name: A small man stands in the middle of the room, watching you.

7518.name: The Barkeep~
description: He is fairly short, and in his late forties.  He has grey hair and a short grey beard.  He looks like a decent guy.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
7518.room_name: The barkeep stands behind a bar cleaning glasses.

7519.name: Crazy Melvin~
description: She sits back in the shadows, rambling on about this and that.  She doesn't seem to be one for proper grammar, and her slurred speech doesn't help.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M speech 7530 melvin~
7519.room_name: Crazy Melvin sits back and babbles grammatically incorrect gibberish.

7520.name: The Receptionist~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
7520.room_name: The Receptionist stands behind a desk.

7521.name: The Possum~
description: He is short and grey, with a wild look in his eyes.  He has a tall green top hat and some green trousers.  He must be crazy.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M grall 7531 75~
7521.room_name: A {$c{!r{^a{#z{!y{7-{@e{%y{!e{$d{7 possum walks about, knocking on doors.{x

7522.name: The Fifth Deciple~
description: He stands about 6'1", and is in his late thirties.  He seems to have a sensable holy aura to him, which most likely makes him a toughie.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
7522.room_name: A large man floats before you, chanting softly.

7523.name: The Two Headed Cat~
description: It is small and grey, with white whiskers.  He is rather odd looking, due to his two heads.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

7524.name: The Forest Citizen~
description: He is about 6 foot even, and appears to be cold, but comfortable.  He is in his late forties.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

7525.name: Pappy~
description: He is old, maybe in his seventies.  He has a white beard that goes down his front.  He looks rather fit for being old.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M fight 7532 45~
7525.room_name: An old man walks around, {@d{%a{!z{^e{#d{7 and {^c{#o{@n{!f{@u{$s{&e{@d{7.{x

7526.name: Emerald WEAPON~
description: He's big, REAL big.  He's pretty green too.  He's also got this big spike comin' out his back... lookout.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

7527.name: The Carnassid~
description: He's pretty big, and pretty mean.  I doubt you're really got time to read this, with him breathing down your neck and all.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M fight 7533 60~
7527.room_name: A massive {@Ca{2rnass{@id{7 bears down on you.{x

7528.name: The Blinking Spirit~
description: It is a small farie type creature.  It floats around the area, weaving within anything it gets near.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

7529.name: Frostillicus~
description: He looks like he's been in the freezer for a while, but still alive.  He's average height, and in his late fifties.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
7529.room_name: Frostillicus stands here, with a proud grin.

7530.name: The Zombie~
description: He is pretty dead... Well, in a matter of speaking...
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M grall 7535 60~
7530.room_name: A rotting corpse walks your way... Zombie Alert!

7531.name: The Graveyard Keeper~
description: He is a short man, maybe in his late forties.  He doesn't look very tough physically, but no doubt he's got the stomach for the job.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
7531.room_name: A small stout man is sitting on the bed, reading scary novels.

7532.name: Frankenstein~
description: He's pretty big and green.  Some bolts are set in place in his neck... ouchers.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

7533.name: Akron~
description: He is tall, and has a holy aura about him.  He holds his sword in his hands, as if admiring it's beauty.  There's a prize to be had.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M death 7541 100~
M fight 7536 10~
M fight 7538 65~
M fight 7537 70~
M grall 7539 100~

7534.name: The Attendant~
description: He is big and tall, and not very happy to see you.  He stands calmly before you, but has a malicious look in his eye.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
7534.room_name: A large Attendant watches you carefully.

7535.name: a dream~
subroutines: M random 30800 22~
7535.room_name: An invisible dream sprite is here, granting dreams.

7699.name: dagger bash~
description:
{Ca large bear with ice slowing from its body stands here
it looks to make you lunch or maybe just save you for later
